name: Vegan Matcha-Banana Smoothie
description: This subtly sweet vegan smoothie makes the perfect summer breakfast: ultra-creamy with a hint of grassy green tea powder, it's delicious enough to double as dessert.
recipeIngredient: 1 banana, peeled, cut into chunks, and frozen overnight

recipeInstructions.text: Add banana, soy milk, agave, and matcha to blender. Blend on high until completely smooth, about 30 seconds. Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
